pr_title: Accidentally merged pull request before pushing changes from code review

timeline.bodyText:
change to ourLog.error
Also, the exception is getting lost.
I suggest log the exception in a separate ourLog.error("exception: ", theE)
timeline.author: fil512

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. I will also restore the previous check of the code system version ID prior to saving the TermConcept so as to minimize the possibility of this being logged as an exception.
replies.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.author: fil512
